a.n: North Sea Jazz Archive: Buddy Rich in

p.k: North Sea Jazz Archive: Buddy Rich in 1978 1978. Buddy Rich, Andy Fusco, Chuck Wilson & Steve Marcus. North Sea Jazz Festival, The Hague, The Netherlands
p.d: The world-renowned North Sea Jazz Festival features a wide variety of genres, including traditional New Orleans jazz, swing, bop, free jazz, fusion, avant-garde and electronic jazz, blues, gospel, funk, soul, R&B, hip hop, world beat and Latin. The festival was founded by entrepreneur and jazz fan Paul Acket, who sold his highly successful pop magazine publishing house to organize and fund the first edition of the festival in 1976. This broadcast from the North Sea Jazz Archives presents the legendary drummer Buddy Rich.
